hints.content:
To find how many cards $\goldE{\text{Matt}}$ has, we start with the number of cards $\blueE{\text{Katy}}$ has, and add $\maroonD{5\text{ cards}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/96bebbcc415c2a61075051dedda64599ce266d8b)

$\blueE{6} + \maroonD{5} = \goldE{\Box}$

Let's add to find the total number of cards $\goldE{\text{Matt}}$ has.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6fe611ded1b2b270472d8ca66a00dfaf0439404d)

$\blueE{6} + \maroonD{5} = \goldE{11}$

question.content:
Katy and Matt are playing a card game. 

Katy has $6$ cards.  Matt has $5$ more cards than Katy.  

**How many cards does Matt have?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] cards
